scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin client.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/client.html && usemin contact-index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact-index.html && usemin contact-trainer.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact-trainer.html && usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin messenger-trainer.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/messenger-trainer.html && usemin messenger.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/messenger.html && usemin trainer.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/trainer.html && usemin workouts-trainer.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/workouts-trainer.html && usemin workouts.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/workouts.html
